PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-04511995-03-210IA&ND,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of STINDAR K. LAL, of Oakville, Ontario, as Chairman of the Arbitration Board for a term of three years, effective January 27, 1995; re-appointment of ALFRED ERNEST PALLISTER, of Calgary, Alberta, as Vice-Chairman of the Arbitration Board for a term of three years, effective January 27, 1995; and re-appointment of JOHN HAVELOCK PARKER, of Sidney, British Columbia, as a member of the Arbitration Board for a term of three years, effective March 26, 1995.
Attachments
